website_summaries.verdict: Basic design in a propane tank gauge that also has built-in safety features to guard against leaks.
pros: Color-coded gauge system set against a white background is easy to read
Uses a sturdy construction to ensure long-lasting performance and a high level of safety
Features an automatic shut-off value in case a leak is detected
cons: Seal on the glass in the gauge isn't tight, leading to build-up of condensation

customer_reviews.title: They do a darn good job of showing what is in the tank
customer_reviews.text: No more guessing if the tank is empty or full. Was not sure how well they would work. They do a darn good job of showing what is in the tank. Should have ordered one more for my grill at the house. Will never be without them again on the camper.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: It pretty much works, but the needle never reaches far into the green area; on a full tank, the needle points somewhere in the left half of the green area.
customer_reviews.author: sudonym

customer_reviews.title: connects well, clear indicator gauge
customer_reviews.text: Attaches Fine on both ends (to tank and to grill hose) without difficulty or leaking. Gauge reads gas level clearly. Also useful for a visual indicator of whether or not gas is on.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Sprat

customer_reviews.title: Great propane tank reader
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Easy to read. Excellent price, and now we'll know before we run out of propane that we need some. Nothing worse than to have the grill run out in the middle of cooking. Get one.
customer_reviews.author: DawnFelice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these gauges, takes the guess work out, is it empty or full
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: UNREADABLE GUAGE DUE TO MOISTURE BUILD UP
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. Both defective. They are full of moisture, which makes then very difficult to read. Contacted seller, and they say return to Amazon. Amazon won't replace because it has been just over one month since I purchased. The product appears to work, but haven't used my tanks that much to tell. Come on Amazon. Help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: works great easy install.
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my travel trailer and it works great. now I just need three more and for the price its totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind for cookouts.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No more running out of propane unexpectedly. Don't forget to take it off if you are exchanging your tank!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer s

customer_reviews.title: Works, kind of.
customer_reviews.text: Works, kind of, but starts off on yellow not green. This could be because I am using it on a 40 lb tank.
customer_reviews.author: William C Howe-Hughes

customer_reviews.title: ... helps yo monitor how much propane you use and pretty accurate
customer_reviews.text: I use these all the time very helpful this helps yo monitor how much propane you use and pretty accurate
customer_reviews.author: Maurice E. Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Great for Trailer RVs!
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I bought two to take the guess work out of knowing the LP gas levels on the RV before I leave.
customer_reviews.author: Carol in West Florida

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really work it basicly say yes you have gas or no you dont.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is necessary to tell to the customer that this device is a pressure regulator too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky Hamilton

product_meta.title: Awakingdemi Gas Grill Adapter, Propane Tank Adapters, Propane Tank Gauge Gas Grill BBQ Pressure Meter Indicator Fuel Brass
product_meta.description:
Features:
Allows you to quickly and easily check the amount of propane in your fuel tank
Made from a sturdy brass material for long-lasting use,
Features a built-in detection system for leaks and an automatic shut-off for safety.
The fuel flow can be regulated with an emergency flow control depending on the type of appliance used
Compatible with propane appliances featuring a type 1 connection 
Material :brass material 
Package Weight:285g

Package includes:
1 X Propane Adapter
feature_bullets: Allows you to quickly and easily check the amount of propane in your fuel tank
Made from a sturdy brass material for long-lasting use,
Features a built-in detection system for leaks and an automatic shut-off for safety.
The fuel flow can be regulated with an emergency flow control depending on the type of appliance used
Compatible with propane appliances featuring a type 1 connection
